channel.title: Everything reaches its peak
channel.description:
Well, rsc development is dead. i started out as a newb with no knowledge of java whatsoever, but i did read books, looked thro handlers, client to serverside and learned along the way, unfortually people dont do this anymore, they want c+p tutorials.. they want it to be rs2 "development". rsc development nowadays is xml edits.
So this is farewell fellow moparscapers, im done with trying to develop something thats already doomed.
i will keep selling coding to diffrent servers as before, but developin my own? naaaw. i sold sweo, so it wont be relased public unfortunally. -but i will release an server with admin gui soon, 1-click-done. no coding skills needed. just to try to keep the noobs away with their stupid threads.
bai<3

It’s a shame sweo won’t be released. Anyways, bye.

100% perfect working sources like gay rs2

item.title: Everything reaches its peak
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:4, topic:230593”]I left long time ago, well out of the actual creating a server scene, i do help friends out. But I’m in it for the money.

I was tempted on checking out some rs2 sources, and trying to advance it for money, since they have far more bigger population, maybe i could work on a server/fix bugs etc, I’m sure id get good money over there.

As they say in ET, v55[/quote]

Don’t quote ET if you can’t play vs me, nigr.

O/T: Bye.

Read full topic

i started out as a newb with no knowledge of java whatsoever,
